subject: Automobile Racing
Women and Girls
lead_paragraph: Last month, in what could constitute the first rumbling of a revolution, the Sauber Formula One team appointed a woman, Monisha Kaltenborn, as the team principal, the sport's first female team director.
snippet: Last month, in what could constitute the first rumbling of a revolution, the Sauber Formula One team appointed a woman, Monisha Kaltenborn, as the team principal, the sport's first female team director.
